comment: She was incredibly kind to everyone and always tries to give help if needed. She is also lenient and I would completely recommend her to anyone.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Ms. Coucheron is not only a wonderful person, but she's an even better teacher. I came into this class with no piano experience and now I feel like I can continue on my own. The class itself is very straightforward, she's very lenient and more than happy to give you extra help. I totally recommend taking this class to everyone.

Talented, brilliant, incredible, amazing, show stopping, spectacular, never the same, totally unique. WONDERFUL woman, and great teacher. I knew nothing about piano, and now I'm showing off to my friends my piano skills. Class is fun, but participation is mandatory so you MUST learn the homework she assigns. Lenient on attendance. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: She is an excellent pianist and an even better teacher. She's a wonderful person and wants you to do well and is excited when you do well. She is also willing to give you extra help if you need it and will answer any question to help you succeed. I highly recommend taking her!
